verses.verse: In the third <WH7992> month <WH2320> after the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> had gone out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> on that same day <WH3117> they came <WH935> into the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai. <WH5514>

When they had departed <WH5265> from Rephidim, <WH7508> and had come <WH935> to the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai, <WH5514> they encamped <WH2583> in the wilderness; <WH4057> and there Israel <WH3478> encamped <WH2583> before the mountain. <WH2022>

Moses <WH4872> went up <WH5927> to God, <WH430> and Yahweh <WH3068> called <WH7121> to him out of the mountain, <WH2022> saying, <WH559> "This is what you shall tell <WH559> the house <WH1004> of Jacob, <WH3290> and tell <WH559> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478>
<WH7200> 'You have seen what I did <WH6213> to the Egyptians, <WH4714> and how I bore <WH5375> you on eagles <WH5404>' wings, <WH3671> and brought you to myself. <WH935>

Now therefore, <WH8085> if you will indeed obey <WH8085> my voice, <WH6963> and keep <WH8104> my covenant, <WH1285> then you shall be my own possession <WH5459> from among all peoples; <WH5971> for all the earth is mine; <WH776>

and you shall be to me a kingdom <WH4467> of priests, <WH3548> and a holy <WH6918> nation. <WH1471>' These are the words <WH1697> which you shall speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>"
Moses <WH4872> came <WH935> and called <WH7121> for the elders <WH2205> of the people, <WH5971> and set before them all these words <WH1697> which Yahweh <WH3068> commanded him. <WH6680>

All the people <WH5971> answered <WH6030> together, <WH3162> and said, <WH559> "All that Yahweh <WH3068> has spoken <WH559> we will do. <WH6213>" Moses <WH4872> reported <WH7725> the words <WH1697> of the people <WH5971> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Behold, <WH935> I come to you in a thick <WH5645> cloud, <WH6051> that the people <WH5971> may hear <WH8085> when I speak <WH1696> with you, <WH539> and may also believe you forever. <WH5769>" Moses <WH4872> told <WH5046> the words <WH1697> of the people <WH5971> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Go <WH3212> to the people, <WH5971> and sanctify <WH6942> them today <WH3117> and tomorrow, <WH4279> and let them wash <WH3526> their garments, <WH8071>

and be ready <WH3559> against the third <WH7992> day; <WH3117> for on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> Yahweh <WH3068> will come down <WH3381> in the sight <WH5869> of all the people <WH5971> on Mount <WH2022> Sinai. <WH5514>

You shall set bounds <WH1379> to the people <WH5971> all around, <WH5439> saying, <WH559> <WH8104> 'Be careful that you don't <WH5927> go up onto the mountain, <WH2022> or touch <WH5060> its border. <WH7097> Whoever touches <WH5060> the mountain <WH2022> shall be surely <WH4191> put to death. <WH4191>

No hand <WH3027> shall touch <WH5060> him, <WH5619> but he shall surely be stoned <WH5619> or <WH176> shot <WH3384> through; <WH3384> whether it is animal <WH929> or <WH176> man, <WH376> he shall not live. <WH2421>' When the trumpet <WH3104> sounds long, <WH4900> they shall come up <WH5927> to the mountain. <WH2022>"
Moses <WH4872> went down <WH3381> from the mountain <WH2022> to the people, <WH5971> and sanctified <WH6942> the people; <WH5971> and they washed <WH3526> their clothes. <WH8071>
He said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> "Be <WH1961> ready <WH3559> by the third <WH7969> day. <WH3117> Don't <WH5066> have sexual relations with a woman. <WH802>"

It happened on the third <WH7992> day, <WH3117> when it was morning, <WH1242> that there were thunders <WH6963> and lightnings, <WH1300> and a thick <WH3515> cloud <WH6051> on the mountain, <WH2022> and the sound <WH6963> of an exceedingly <WH3966> loud <WH2389> trumpet; <WH7782> and all the people <WH5971> who were in the camp <WH4264> trembled. <WH2729>
Moses <WH4872> led the people <WH5971> out <WH3318> of the camp <WH4264> to meet <WH7125> God; <WH430> and they stood <WH3320> at the lower <WH8482> part of the mountain. <WH2022>

Mount <WH2022> Sinai, <WH5514> all it, <WH6225> smoked, because <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> descended <WH3381> on it in fire; <WH784> and its smoke <WH6227> ascended <WH5927> like the smoke <WH6227> of a furnace, <WH3536> and the whole mountain <WH2022> quaked <WH2729> greatly. <WH3966>
When the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782> grew <WH6963> louder <WH1980> and <WH3966> louder, <WH2390> Moses <WH4872> spoke, <WH1696> and God <WH430> answered <WH6030> him by a voice. <WH6963>

Yahweh <WH3068> came down <WH3381> on Mount <WH2022> Sinai, <WH5514> to the top <WH7218> of the mountain. <WH2022> Yahweh <WH3068> called <WH7121> Moses <WH4872> to <WH413> the top <WH413> of the mountain, <WH2022> and Moses <WH4872> went up. <WH5927>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Go down, <WH3381> warn <WH5749> the people, <WH5971> lest they break through <WH2040> to Yahweh <WH3068> to gaze, <WH7200> and many <WH7227> of them perish. <WH5307>
Let the priests <WH3548> also, <WH5066> who come near to Yahweh, <WH3068> sanctify <WH6942> themselves, <WH3068> lest Yahweh break forth on them. <WH6555>"

Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to Yahweh, <WH3068> "The people <WH5971> can't <WH3201> come up <WH5927> to Mount <WH2022> Sinai, <WH5514> for you warned <WH5749> us, <WH559> saying, <WH1379> 'Set bounds around the mountain, <WH2022> and sanctify it. <WH6942>'"

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to him, <WH3212> "Go down <WH3381> and you shall bring Aaron <WH175> up <WH5927> with you, <WH3548> but don't let the priests and the people <WH5971> break through <WH2040> to come up <WH5927> to Yahweh, <WH3068> lest he break forth on them. <WH6555>"
So Moses <WH4872> went down <WH3381> to the people, <WH5971> and told them. <WH559>
